sources.title: Ghost Boat (Alarmed) | Full Movie Thriller
sources.description:
***This film is under license from ITN Distribution. All rights reserved.***

Ghost Boat - Trapped aboard the family yacht, Samantha lives out her personal Hell, night after night, answering to the cruel and painful demands of the ship's alarm system. Taking a journey into the depths of depravity, she wakes each morning to the disfiguring scars left by the previous night's horror and searches for the answer to a missing memory: 'Could I have killed my family... Or did Hell get it wrong?'

2014
Stars: Jennifer Stuckert, Olivia Aaron, Heidi Brigman

Welcome to Movie Central. Subscribe and watch more Awesome Movies. 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGBzBkV-MinlBvHBzZawfLQ/playlists

Taking a journey into the depths of depravity, she wakes each morning to the disfiguring scars left by the previous night's horror and searches for the answer to a missing memory: 'Could I have killed my family... Or did Hell get it wrong?'
